channel.title: passion on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in passion on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Come dream with me
item.description: What does our country really need? We need to make sure every citizen gets enough to eat, clothe themselves and opportunity to enrich themselves using good quality education, and employment.

item.title: Adult
item.description: 25th May 2007 I suddenly realize I am a machine. I do the same things everyday. I’ve stopped feeling. I’ve stopped thinking. I’m too busy with my life.

item.title: Types of Love: An Analysis.
item.description: It is perhaps important to differentiate the various meaning that we refer to when we say the word love. Often ‘love’ is used in the place of a more suitable word.
